alert.note: Alert for Alexander; Pulaski; Union (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 2:47PM CDT until July 02 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Union County in southern Illinois... Pulaski County in southern Illinois... Alexander County in southern Illinois... North central Scott County in southeastern Missouri... Southeastern Cape Girardeau County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 247 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tamms, or 9 miles east of Scott City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. Gusts up to 60 mph have been reported with this storm. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cape Girardeau, Scott City, Dongola, Tamms, Kelso, Olive Branch, Cape Girardeau Airport, Ullin, Thebes, New Grand Chain, Pulaski, Commerce, Mill Creek and East Cape Girardeau. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 13 and 28. Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 84 and 97. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
